result.eng: Will you still be around for another few minutes?
result.ga: An mbeidh tú fós thart go ceann cúpla nóiméad eile
result.orig: An mbeidh tú fós thart go ceann cúpla nóiméad eile
result.html: An mbeidh tú fós thart go ceann cúpla nóiméad eileWill you still be around for another few minutes?
result.ponchtml: An mbeiḋ tú fós ṫart go ceann cúpla nóiméad eileWill you still be around for another few minutes?

result.eng: The king was decapitated.
result.ga: Baineadh an ceann den rí
result.orig: Baineadh an ceann den rí
result.html: Baineadh an ceann den ríThe king was decapitated.
result.ponchtml: Baineaḋ an ceann den ríThe king was decapitated.

result.eng: She will cut your head off if she sees you!
result.ga: Bainfidh sí an ceann díot má fheiceann sí thú
result.orig: Bainfidh sí an ceann díot má fheiceann sí thú
result.html: Bainfidh sí an ceann díot má fheiceann sí thúShe will cut your head off if she sees you!
result.ponchtml: Bainfiḋ sí an ceann díot má ḟeiceann sí ṫúShe will cut your head off if she sees you!

result.eng: One of these cars was stolen.
result.ga: Goideadh ceann de na carranna seo
result.orig: Goideadh ceann de na carranna seo
result.html: Goideadh ceann de na carranna seoOne of these cars was stolen.
result.ponchtml: Goideaḋ ceann de na carranna seoOne of these cars was stolen.

result.eng: Destination: London.
result.ga: Ceann scríbe Londain
result.orig: Ceann scríbe Londain
result.html: Ceann scríbe LondainDestination: London.
result.ponchtml: Ceann scríbe LondainDestination: London.

result.eng: Stay for a while!
result.ga: Fan go ceann tamaill
result.orig: Fan go ceann tamaill
result.html: Fan go ceann tamaillStay for a while!
result.ponchtml: Fan go ceann tamaillStay for a while!

result.eng: By the time I had reached the destination I was tired.
result.ga: Faoin am a shroich mé an ceann scríbe bhí tuirse orm
result.orig: Faoin am a shroich mé an ceann scríbe bhí tuirse orm
result.html: Faoin am a shroich mé an ceann scríbe bhí tuirse ormBy the time I had reached the destination I was tired.
result.ponchtml: Faoin am a ẛroiċ mé an ceann scríbe ḃí tuirse ormBy the time I had reached the destination I was tired.

result.eng: Many a person in this country doesn't read a book the whole year.
result.ga: Is iomaí duine sa tír seo nach léann leabhar ar bith ó cheann ceann na bliana
result.orig: Is iomaí duine sa tír seo nach léann leabhar ar bith ó cheann ceann na bliana
result.html: Is iomaí duine sa tír seo nach léann leabhar ar bith ó cheann ceann na blianaMany a person in this country doesn't read a book the whole year.
result.ponchtml: Is iomaí duine sa tír seo naċ léann leaḃar ar biṫ ó ċeann ceann na blianaMany a person in this country doesn't read a book the whole year.

result.eng: If you lose it, you can buy a new one.
result.ga: Má chailleann tú é is féidir leat ceann nua a cheannach
result.orig: Má chailleann tú é is féidir leat ceann nua a cheannach
result.html: Má chailleann tú é is féidir leat ceann nua a cheannachIf you lose it, you can buy a new one.
result.ponchtml: Má ċailleann tú é is féidir leat ceann nua a ċeannaċIf you lose it, you can buy a new one.

result.eng: I only got one.
result.ga: Ní bhfuair mé ach ceann amháin
result.orig: Ní bhfuair mé ach ceann amháin
result.html: Ní bhfuair mé ach ceann amháinI only got one.
result.ponchtml: Ní ḃfuair mé aċ ceann aṁáinI only got one.

result.eng: This is the last one.
result.ga: Seo é an ceann deireanach
result.orig: Seo é an ceann deireanach
result.html: Seo é an ceann deireanachThis is the last one.
result.ponchtml: Seo é an ceann deireanaċThis is the last one.

result.eng: This is one of the mistakes you made.
result.ga: Seo é ceann de na botúin a rinne tú
result.orig: Seo é ceann de na botúin a rinne tú
result.html: Seo é ceann de na botúin a rinne túThis is one of the mistakes you made.
result.ponchtml: Seo é ceann de na botúin a rinne túThis is one of the mistakes you made.

result.eng: I am going to Cork for a week.
result.ga: Tá mé ag dul go Corcaigh go ceann seachtaine
result.orig: Tá mé ag dul go Corcaigh go ceann seachtaine
result.html: Tá mé ag dul go Corcaigh go ceann seachtaineI am going to Cork for a week.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé ag dul go Corcaiġ go ceann seaċtaineI am going to Cork for a week.

result.eng: Well, there is one in An Cnoc next to the church.
result.ga: Bhuel tá ceann ar an gCnoc in aice leis an séipéal
result.orig: Bhuel tá ceann ar an gCnoc in aice leis an séipéal
result.html: Bhuel tá ceann ar an gCnoc in aice leis an séipéalWell, there is one in An Cnoc next to the church.
result.ponchtml: Ḃuel tá ceann ar an gCnoc in aice leis an séipéalWell, there is one in An Cnoc next to the church.

result.eng: That one [a bus] has left already, but there is another one at 11.45.
result.ga: Tá sé sin imithe cheana féin ach tá ceann eile ann ag ceathrú chun a dó dhéag
result.orig: Tá sé sin imithe cheana féin ach tá ceann eile ann ag ceathrú chun a dó dhéag
result.html: Tá sé sin imithe cheana féin ach tá ceann eile ann ag ceathrú chun a dó dhéagThat one [a bus] has left already, but there is another one at 11.45.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé sin imiṫe ċeana féin aċ tá ceann eile ann ag ceaṫrú ċun a dó ḋéagThat one [a bus] has left already, but there is another one at 11.45.

result.eng: Which one?
result.ga: Cé acu ceann
result.orig: Cé acu ceann
result.html: Cé acu ceannWhich one?
result.ponchtml: Cé acu ceannWhich one?

result.eng: The green one with "Éire" written on it or this one?
result.ga: An ceann uaine le Éire scríofa air nó an ceann seo
result.orig: An ceann uaine le Éire scríofa air nó an ceann seo
result.html: An ceann uaine le Éire scríofa air nó an ceann seoThe green one with "Éire" written on it or this one?
result.ponchtml: An ceann uaine le Éire scríofa air nó an ceann seoThe green one with "Éire" written on it or this one?

result.eng: The green one.
result.ga: An ceann uaine
result.orig: An ceann uaine
result.html: An ceann uaineThe green one.
result.ponchtml: An ceann uaineThe green one.

result.eng: This one.
result.ga: An ceann seo
result.orig: An ceann seo
result.html: An ceann seoThis one.
result.ponchtml: An ceann seoThis one.

result.eng: Tell me about the pastimes you have from one end of the week to the other.
result.ga: Inis dom faoin gcaitheamh aimsire a bhíonn agat ó cheann ceann na seachtaine
result.orig: Inis dom faoin gcaitheamh aimsire a bhíonn agat ó cheann ceann na seachtaine
result.html: Inis dom faoin gcaitheamh aimsire a bhíonn agat ó cheann ceann na seachtaineTell me about the pastimes you have from one end of the week to the other.
result.ponchtml: Inis dom faoin gcaiṫeaṁ aimsire a ḃíonn agat ó ċeann ceann na seaċtaineTell me about the pastimes you have from one end of the week to the other.

result.eng: Two of them are very big but the other one is very small.
result.ga: Tá dhá cheann acu an-mhór ach tá an ceann eile an-bheag
result.orig: Tá dhá cheann acu an-mhór ach tá an ceann eile an-bheag
result.html: Tá dhá cheann acu an-mhór ach tá an ceann eile an-bheagTwo of them are very big but the other one is very small.
result.ponchtml: Tá ḋá ċeann acu an-ṁór aċ tá an ceann eile an-ḃeagTwo of them are very big but the other one is very small.

result.eng: For a whole week, flights were grounded in the country with only occasional exceptions and, of course, hardly anybody even wanted to fly.
result.ga: Níor ceadaíodh ach correitilt sa tír go ceann seachtaine eile agus ar ndóigh ba bheag duine a bhí ag iarraidh eitilt ach oiread
result.orig: Níor ceadaíodh ach correitilt sa tír go ceann seachtaine eile agus ar ndóigh ba bheag duine a bhí ag iarraidh eitilt ach oiread
result.html: Níor ceadaíodh ach correitilt sa tír go ceann seachtaine eile agus ar ndóigh ba bheag duine a bhí ag iarraidh eitilt ach oireadFor a whole week, flights were grounded in the country with only occasional exceptions and, of course, hardly anybody even wanted to fly.
result.ponchtml: Níor ceadaíoḋ aċ correitilt sa tír go ceann seaċtaine eile agus ar ndóiġ ba ḃeag duine a ḃí ag iarraiḋ eitilt aċ oireadFor a whole week, flights were grounded in the country with only occasional exceptions and, of course, hardly anybody even wanted to fly.

result.eng: By 1865, owning people was against the law in each of the United States.
result.ga: Faoi 1865 bhí úinéaracht daoine in aghaidh an dlí in gach ceann de na Stáit Aontaithe
result.orig: Faoi 1865 bhí úinéaracht daoine in aghaidh an dlí in gach ceann de na Stáit Aontaithe
result.html: Faoi 1865 bhí úinéaracht daoine in aghaidh an dlí in gach ceann de na Stáit AontaitheBy 1865, owning people was against the law in each of the United States.
result.ponchtml: Faoi 1865 ḃí úinéaraċt daoine in aġaiḋ an dlí in gaċ ceann de na Stáit AontaiṫeBy 1865, owning people was against the law in each of the United States.
